snippet.title: Dungeon Renovation Simulator - First Gameplay Video (Pre Alpha Footage)
snippet.description:
Dungeon Renovation Simulator is a single-player simulation game in which player cleans and renovates the dungeons from the first –person view. Players take on the role of a “Cursed Goblin” dungeon cleaner and renovator, exploring and tidy up dungeons. Along the way, they'll take on mysterious physics-based quests, order new items, and renovate as they wish to breathe new life into these dark and eerie spaces. 

For more: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2222020/Dungeon_Renovation_Simulator/
